channel.title: Comments on: BNN Was Wrong: Magic Season 14 Recap

item.title: By: Power Ranking Rankings: BNN by Season Edition - Blaseball News Network
item.dc:creator: Power Ranking Rankings: BNN by Season Edition - Blaseball News Network
item.description: […] And there goes that 16 off-Differential record. The Crabs came back in Season 13, outperformed our expectations and went right back to winning Championships… So why shouldn’t we expect more Claws Up? Because we hadn’t learned our lesson about Flinch with the Shoe Thieves, that’s why. And on the other claw hand, we also had Magic Goo: there is already an entire article concerning why we were wrong about the Magic.  […]
item.content:encoded: […] And there goes that 16 off-Differential record. The Crabs came back in Season 13, outperformed our expectations and went right back to winning Championships… So why shouldn’t we expect more Claws Up? Because we hadn’t learned our lesson about Flinch with the Shoe Thieves, that’s why. And on the other claw hand, we also had Magic Goo: there is already an entire article concerning why we were wrong about the Magic.  […]
